events.comment: You can change these initial values to adjust how many times the cards are "shuffled" or the delay between turns or games.

variable.comment: Number of times to swap cards when shuffling the decks.
variable.name: gNumberShuffleSwaps

variable.comment: Seconds to wait before flipping cards face down. Also used for other delays.
variable.name: gCardResetDelay

variable.comment: Seconds to wait before starting a new game after a win.
variable.name: gGameResetDelay

events.comment: Do not change these initial values unless you know what you are doing!

variable.comment: The number of cards in the tableau.
variable.name: gNumberCards

variable.comment: The number of rows in the tableau
variable.name: gNumberRows

variable.comment: The number of columns in the tableau.
variable.name: gNumberColumns

variable.comment: Space between each row or column of cards.
variable.name: gSpaceBetweenCards

events.comment: Do not change these initial values or testing for matches will break.

variable.comment: The CardFaceFrame for the first card picked during a turn.
variable.name: gFirstCardFrame

variable.comment: The CardFaceFrame for the second card picked during a turn.
variable.name: gSecondCardFrame

events.comment: Changing these initial values has no effect.

variable.comment: Space between top of game window and first row of cards
variable.name: gMarginTop

variable.comment: Space between left side of window and first column of cards.
variable.name: gMarginLeft

variable.comment: Calculated height of cards based on window size.
variable.name: gCardHeight

variable.comment: Calculated width of cards based on window size.
variable.name: gCardWidth

variable.comment: Counter to track number of cards currently face up.
variable.name: gCountCardsPicked

variable.comment: Accumulates the number of turns taken during the game.
variable.name: gTurns

variable.comment: Accumulates the number of pairs of cards matched in the game.
variable.name: gMatches
